verbs.description: [ARG0: A financial advisor] [V: gives] [ARG1: his take on the Trump - Kim summit] . President Trump 's approach to international relationships is to size people up personally . Sons of wealthy and powerful men , Trump and Kim have more in common than many people realize and their relationship resembles a schoolboy fist fight .
